Name: Appily Married
Ingredients: 10 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled pre-prepared glass.
Review: Apple and honey are indeed a marriage made in heaven, especially when laced with grainy vodka notes.
History: Created in 2005 by your's truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Appily Married contains 147 calories
